situation: A major earthquake (7.2 magnitude) has struck 50km from our main manufacturing plant. The facility appears structurally intact but all road access is blocked by debris. 2,000 employees are on-site. Power is intermittent. We have contractual delivery obligations worth $40M due in 3 weeks.
additional_context: We have a secondary facility in another state operating at 40% capacity. Emergency supplies on-site cover 72 hours. Local emergency services are overwhelmed.
constraints: Insurance claims will take months. No helicopter landing pad on-site. Secondary facility lacks tooling for our flagship product line.
